title: Washington (England)
name: Beamish Open Air Museum
price: Â£17.50, allows several visits within one year
content: This is one of the country's most popular open air museums.  Set in the countryside, this museum recreates life in the local area during the 1800s and 1900's.  It is both entertaining and educational for both younger and older people and provides a good day out for the family.
